doc.after: The Essjay controversy was an incident concerning a prominent Wikipedia participant and salaried Wikia employee known by the username Essjay 1 who later identified himself as Ryan Jordan Jordan held trusted volunteer positions within Wikipedia known as administrator bureaucrat and arbitrator
